item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerabilities are affecting DELMIA Apriso Release 2019 through Release 2024

item.description: An unsafe .NET object deserialization vulnerability in DELMIA Apriso Release 2019 through Release 2024 could lead to post-authentication remote code execution.
